value:
$WmMPID_水着ノルン,ch01_34_Norn_F_Swim21,Face|This way, Lady Caeda! Ooh, look at
that school of beautiful fish... Wow!$k$p$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|They really are beautiful, aren't they!
Plumeria, you should come look too!$k$p$nMPID_プルメリア味方|My... I never thought I'd see such
brilliance outside of a dream.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ノルン,ch01_34_Norn_F_Swim21,Face|I saw a few of these long, thin fish
over in the rocks there. Take a look
at their scary faces!$k$p...Huh? Looks like they're gone.$k$p$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|Perhaps they swam out in that
direction? Shall we go look?$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|Excuse my saying so, Lady Caeda,
but wandering out into the open
sea is not safe.$k$p$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|The water is not so deep, Ogma.
It will be fine.$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|Yes, but...$k$p$WmMPID_プルメリア味方,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|You're being a little overprotective,
wouldn't you say, Ogma? Princess
Caeda is not a child, nor am I.$k$pIf you're going to be constantly
watching us here on the beach, being
at sea sounds like a nice change.$k$p$nMPID_双界シーダ|Talys is an isle, after all—I am familiar
with the ocean. But I appreciate your
concern, Ogma.$k$pSince I'm here on the seashore
of another world, though, I want
to see the sights. Is that all right?$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|...Understood, Princess. Though,
I do hope you will allow me to
continue on as your escort...$k$p$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|Yes, of course, of course. Let's all
enjoy the ocean together!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|Hmm... This is the shop that
caught my interest before!$k$p$nMPID_プルメリア味方|I see it has accessories made from
flowers. They do smell good...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ノルン,ch01_34_Norn_F_Swim21,Face|I bet this one would look great on
you, Lady Freyja! Why don't you
try it on?$k$p$WmMPID_水着フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Swim21,Face|...M-me?$k$p$WmMPID_プルメリア味方,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|I'm sorry, Lady Freyja... I had not
intended to force you into coming,
or into wearing a swimsuit...$k$p$WmMPID_水着フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Swim21,Face|It is all right, Plumeria. Perhaps if
I wear the clothing of mortals, and
learn more about their ways...$k$pThere's a chance I will learn
to understand my brother and
his love for such creatures.$k$pI will wear the flowers.$k$p$WmMPID_プルメリア味方,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|Wonderful! Here you are, then!$k$p

$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|That flower really does suit you
rather well, Lady Freyja!$k$p$WmMPID_水着フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Swim21,Face|Yes... The fragrance is pleasant
as well. This is acceptable.$k$p$Sbs150|
